name: Approval Commented
description: Send a notification to the requester and approvers indicating they have an approval request that has been commented on.
subject: An Approval Request For $approvalName Has Been Commented On
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

An approval request for $approvalName that was submitted #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '' && $requestee.identityID == $__recipient.id) on your behalf by $requester.name #elseif($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '') by $requestee.name #elseif($requester.identityID == $__recipient.id) by you #else by $requester.name #end has been commented on.

#if($requestee.identityID == $__recipient.id || $requester.identityID == $__recipient.id) To take action on or view the status of your approval requests, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$requesterPath #else To review approval requests that are assigned to you, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$approverPath #end


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
